mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test(kinds,gun,gu,bTotal, bActual, bIe, bIndomi,bEtc,bUnme,bEvalue,bStatus,aTotal,aActual,aIe,aStatus,AIndomi,aEtc,aUnme,aEvalue) VALUES(#{bTotal}, #{bActual}, #{bIe}, #{bIndomi}, #{bEtc}, #{bUnme}, #{bEvalue}, #{bStatus}, #{aTotal}, #{aActual}, #{aIe},#{aStatus},#{AIndomi} #{aEtc}, #{aUnme},#{aEvalue} )
